branch_position: Data Types same types as for branch_data and samples tables with entries to be connected:
branch_exposure: Can only be 'Top-of-canopy(TOC)' or 'Mid(M)' or 'Lower(L)'
physical_storage: Can only be 'B4 storage shelves' or 'Freezer' or 'other_notes'
All columns are required unless specified otherwise.
